Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbals! Whenever i try to look up some info about ksp 1.2 i can never find some,so i thought that any sqaud members might be able to answer my question. The wiki isn't much help either. So if you find some information i wish you could tell me!

Edited May 16, 2016 by sumghai
Reverted font colors for easier reading

There is none.

There are some offhand mentions of graphics enhancements, part revamps, vr, and lots of mentions of multiplayer.  However, we have no idea when (or if) any of that is coming and nothing has been confirmed for 1.2.

EDIT: I take that back, we also are fairly confident the antenna system that RoverDude was working on is probably coming in 1.2, so there is that.

Edited May 16, 2016 by Alshain

Can you please write in black like everyone else and not destroy my eyes ? Thank you.

Anyway, 1.2 is not out. No ETA and no official statement on what's in it AFAIK.

Jeez. I think we'll be happy when 1.1.3 comes out first. And probably 1.1.4 and 1.1.5 and after that, maybe after that, we can start dreaming about a 1.2 release. Which will, quite certainly, be delivered Not Soon™.

Edited May 16, 2016 by Kerbart
Supposedly we're getting an overhaul of the stock parts to make them look prettier. (My info may be wrong.) But those ugly 2.5M tanks need to be fixed, yo.

2 minutes ago, Kuansenhama said:

Supposedly we're getting an overhaul of the stock parts to make them look prettier. (My info may be wrong.) But those ugly 2.5M tanks need to be fixed, yo.

We don't know when that will be coming.   From what I've seen it's not even certain if we know if that is really coming.

5 hours ago, Gaarst said:

Can you please write in black like everyone else and not destroy my eyes ? Thank you.

Anyway, 1.2 is not out. No ETA and no official statement on what's in it AFAIK.

Don't worry i wont destroy your kerbal eyes!

 

4 hours ago, Kerbart said:

Jeez. I think we'll be happy when 1.1.3 comes out first. And probably 1.1.4 and 1.1.5 and after that, maybe after that, we can start dreaming about a 1.2 release. Which will, quite certainly, be delivered Not Soon™.

That probably is true, we all know what happened with 1.0.

Edited May 16, 2016 by Jeb-head-mug kerman

Before 1.1 was released it looked like the rocket part revamp and antenna system would be added in 1.2.

It's best to assume that, because 1.1 isn't going to plan, 1.2 won't either. Let's wait until we get a new set of devnotes and hope they mention it.

Edited May 16, 2016 by KerbonautInTraining

4 hours ago, KerbonautInTraining said:

Before 1.1 was released it looked like the rocket part revamp and antenna system would be added in 1.2.

It's best to assume that, because 1.1 isn't going to plan, 1.2 won't either. Let's wait until we get a new set of devnotes and hope they mention it.

Yeah.
